DOC.brief_summary: Study to determine the bronchodilatory effects of PF-04191834 compared with zileuton in patients with asthma
DOC.brief_title: PF-04191834 Single Dose Bronchodilatory Study In Asthma.
DOC.criteria: Persistent mild/moderate asthma for at least 6 months. Reduced lung function Reversible airway obstruction Pregnant/nursing females. Liver function tests greater than upper limit of normal (ULN)
